# Server Rules
General Guidelines: - If you are Under 18, leave the server immediately. This is an adult space. - Be nice and cooperate with your fellow crewmmates. - Do not grief or self-antag. - Respect people's privacy when asked, do not spy on others in observe/ghost mode. - You must be authorized in the discord to play. - Be willing to teach and experiment with others, this is the ideal environment for this server.
Character related: - This is a furry focused server, so we recommend being a fursona/character of yours to play as. - Do not play as any real life figures.
